net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtcp

Class SenderReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtcp.SenderReport

  • public class SenderReport
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of Sender Report RTCP packets.

      • close

        public void close()

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval(long interval)
        Sets the temporal interval between two RTCP Sender Reports. Default interval is set to 3 secondes. Set 0 to disable RTCP.
        Parameters:
        interval - The interval in milliseconds

      • update

          long rtpts)

        Parameters:

      • setOutputStream

        public void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os,
                   byte channelIdentifier)
        If a TCP is used as the transport protocol for the RTP session, the output stream to which RTP packets will be written to must be specified with this method.
